data.text: @OpenVAERS @DrTessaT @CBCOttawa @CTVNews imagine federally funded news stations broadcasted vaers statistics rather than Covid case counts…
@imdrped @Day171Won @justmythawts888 @OpenVAERS I linked that for the video not the opinion.
@OpenVAERS So with a 99% survival rate ( or better) 248 would have died from Covid instead of 24,827…. Make it make sense that people are king these shots
@imdrped @justmythawts888 @OpenVAERS I bet your of the mindset that in 2020-2021, that GSW to the head was actually a covid death, if the person tested/was suspected of being positive.
@chelseaehunter @Day171Won @justmythawts888 @OpenVAERS Private companies are responsible for their own vaccination policies.  Show me where the CDC says to fire people.

@chelseaehunter @Day171Won @justmythawts888 @OpenVAERS Of course they have an active role. They are the Center for Disease Control. They are trying to control the COVID disease. They make recommendations based on best information available.  Extreme options are everyone follow recs or everyone do their own thing. Which is safer?

@OpenVAERS I feel like a lot of it is not getting reported to VAERS or anyone else. My mother died shortly after taking her second Pfizer shot, and the long term care home said it definitely was not the vaccine. Something tells me that Many health Practitioners are saying these things.

@imdrped @chelseaehunter @Day171Won @OpenVAERS Perhaps not so safe. Short term is all people are talking about ar present. Long term is the disaster - damaged immune systems leading to huge increase in cancers (pathologists already see 20x increase). Worst part the waning and now negative efficacy https://t.co/S01ogfKGTn
